name: Bananaguy 2
description:
:

Bananaguy 2 is about exploring strange and playful worlds collecting "Power Coins" along the way which are used to travel to the next world. Each coin features its own wacky little adventure.

Content:

  • Two colorful, playful and diverse worlds with quirky inhabitants, wacky adventures and many secrets 
  • Total of 54 Power Coins to collect
  • Large moveset with much depth for mastery
  • Approximately one hour to beat the game
  • Banan

Controls:

Xbox (Recommended)

  • Move - Left Stick
  • Jump - A
  • Dive - X
  • Menu - Start
  • Coin List - Select

Computer

  • Move - Arrows
  • Jump - Z
  • Dive - X
  • Menu - ESC
  • Coin List - Tab

Developer Notes:

I hope you enjoy the game! :D If you liked it consider checking out the first game or the Discord! 

This is the first chapter of three. The other two chapters will feature many more worlds and adventures! I hope to see you then! ;D
